com.stephengware.java.games.chess.state.Piece

  • Packages that use Piece 
    Package Description
    com.stephengware.java.games.chess.gui
    Graphical User Interface elements for displaying a chess game as text as on screen.
    com.stephengware.java.games.chess.state
    Data structures for representing the state of a chess game and for searching the space of possible next moves.

      java.lang.Iterable<State> State.next(Piece piece)
